alert.note: Alert for Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; Northwest Pinal County; West Pinal County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 15 at 9:12PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Pinal County through 1000 PM MST... At 912 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Casa Grande, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Casa Grande, Florence, Coolidge, Arizona City, La Palma, Toltec, Arizola, Randolph, Coolidge Airport, Blackwater, Stanfield and Valley Farms. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 187 and 204. AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 160 and 178. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 124 and 141. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; Northwest Pinal County; West Pinal County
